hero.title: Collaborate with Us
hero.subtitle: Building the future of Indian technology together
hero.description: Join our mission to create innovative solutions for India. We're looking for passionate developers, entrepreneurs, and innovators to collaborate on groundbreaking projects.

opportunities.title: Developer Partnership Program
opportunities.description: Partner with us to build next-generation products for the Indian market. Share ideas, contribute code, and grow together.

opportunities.title: Startup Collaboration
opportunities.description: Have a unique idea for the Indian market? Let's build it together. We provide technical expertise, you bring the vision.

opportunities.title: Open Source Contributions
opportunities.description: Contribute to our open-source projects and help build tools that benefit the entire Indian developer community.

opportunities.title: Innovation Lab
opportunities.description: Join our innovation lab to experiment with cutting-edge technologies and create solutions for uniquely Indian problems.

focus_areas.description: Financial solutions for tier-2 and tier-3 cities
Educational technology preserving Indian culture and values
Technology solutions for Indian farmers and agriculture

process.title: Submit Your Idea
process.description: Share your innovative idea or express interest in collaboration through our form.

process.title: Initial Discussion
process.description: We'll schedule a call to discuss your idea, background, and potential collaboration.

process.title: Proposal Review
process.description: Our team evaluates the technical feasibility and market potential of the idea.

process.title: Partnership Agreement
process.description: Define collaboration terms, responsibilities, and revenue sharing model.

process.title: Development Phase
process.description: Start building together with regular milestones and progress reviews.

process.title: Launch & Scale
process.description: Launch the product and scale it across the Indian market together.
